note.p: Birth: North Shields, Tynemouth, Northumberland, England (10 December 1814)
Death: Charing Cross Station, London (22 November 1888)
Career: Assisted in his father's medical practice (for 18 months); moved to London (1853); Assistant Physician, Middlesex Hospital; Physican, Middlesex Hospital (1861)
Notes: W H Sykes has signed the election certificate twice
